description: This Month, Jason Stangroome ( @jstangroome, one of our Readify PowerShell gurus) had a great talk in Sydney DevOps usergroup, about a very interesting framework coming in PowerShell 4.0, which is available in Windows 8.1 RTM (soon or now based on your MSDN subscription).
